com.smartthings.sdk.smartapp.core.extensions.contextstore

Interface InstalledAppContextStore<T extends InstalledAppContext>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DefaultInstalledAppContextStore

    public interface InstalledAppContextStore<T extends InstalledAppContext>
    Implementations of this interface handle storing and updating InstalledAppContext instances, including keeping tokens up-to-date. IMPORTANT: Implementations of this class are responsible for keeping the tokens up-to-date. Refresh tokens expire after 30 days.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(T context)
      Record the given context and keep its tokens up-to-date.
      java.util.stream.Stream<T> get()
      Get a list of active contexts as a stream.
      T get(java.lang.String installedAppId)
      Get the context for the given installedAppId.
      void remove(java.lang.String installedAppId)
      Remove this application from the context store.
      default void update(T context)
      Update the previously-recorded context and keep its tokens up-to-date.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(T context)
        Record the given context and keep its tokens up-to-date. Call this when the application is installed.

      • update

        default void update(T context)
        Update the previously-recorded context and keep its tokens up-to-date. Call this when the application is updated.

      • remove

        void remove(java.lang.String installedAppId)
        Remove this application from the context store. Call this when the application is uninstalled.

      • get

        T get(java.lang.String installedAppId)
        Get the context for the given installedAppId. If tokens are included, they should be good for at least an hour. (If there is less than that, they will be refreshed before being returned.)

      • get

        java.util.stream.Stream<T> get()
        Get a list of active contexts as a stream.
